constants.name: Octane
constants.description: A Node.JS module which provide an object oriented wrapper for the HPE ALM Octane API

limit.description: The number of instances to return in each page from the results of the query.

offset.description: The first position to return from the results of the query. The default is 0.

fields.description: The fields to be returned in the results of the query.

order_by.description: Sorts the entities returned in the results of the query.

query.description: Filter entities returned in the results of the query.
